author: Matthew Dal Santo
title: Folk and Fatherland: How Tight-Knit Denmark Has Weathered the Pandemic
description:
Deep post-Lutheran habits and a strong national culture encouraged a spirit of moderation and kept the nation together.
The post Folk and Fatherland: How Tight-Knit Denmark Has Weathered the Pandemic appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Deep post-Lutheran habits and a strong national culture encouraged a spirit of moderation and kept the nation together.Above the peaceful suburb in central Jutland where I have been seeing out the coronavirus pandemic, the Dannebrog—Denmarks distinctive white… [+9433 chars]
